document.full_text: once a person's name goes on a statewide database of people who are accused of mistreating children, it is difficult ' and time consuming ' to have it removed, even if the initial charges were never proved.
document.title: the texas tribune: for accused, long waits to appeal child abuse allegations
lines_and_colors: once a person's name goes on a statewide database of people who are accused of mistreating children, it is difficult ' and time consuming ' to have it removed, even if the initial charges were never proved.
